intelligence.target_persona: Beginners and regular practitioners in Austin who want a welcoming studio with clear class options and an easy way to sign up

brand.name: Eastside Flow Yoga
brand.objection_handle: Beginner-friendly classes, clear guidance, and a studio that feels welcoming from day one.

hero.headline: A Welcoming Yoga Studio in Austin
hero.subtext: Beginner-friendly flows, strength-focused sessions, and calmer classes—find your pace and feel better this week.

image.alt: Yoga class in a bright, calm studio space

trustbar.headline: Good yoga starts with a good environment

about.story_text: Eastside Flow Yoga is a modern studio built for real life in Austin—busy schedules, stressed bodies, and the desire to feel better without feeling judged. Classes are approachable, instructors are supportive, and you’ll always know what to do next.
about.founder_note: You don’t need to be flexible to start. You just need a calm place to begin—and a teacher who guides you well.

features.title: Beginner Flow
features.description: A supportive class with clear instruction, simple sequences, and time to learn the basics.

features.title: Strength + Mobility
features.description: Build stability and feel better in your body with smart movement and controlled flow.

features.title: Restore + Reset
features.description: Slower paced, stress-reducing sessions designed to help you unwind and recover.

processSteps.title: Pick a class time
processSteps.description: Choose a session that fits your schedule—beginner-friendly options available all week.

processSteps.title: Arrive a few minutes early
processSteps.description: We’ll get you set up and answer any questions. No experience required.

processSteps.title: Move at your pace
processSteps.description: You’ll get clear cues and options. Take breaks when you need to.

processSteps.title: Leave feeling better
processSteps.description: Consistency matters. We’ll help you find a rhythm you can actually maintain.

testimonials.quote: I was nervous as a beginner, but the instructors made it easy. The studio feels calm and welcoming.
testimonials.author: Taylor M.

testimonials.quote: Great schedule and the classes actually help my back and stress. It’s become my weekly reset.
testimonials.author: Jordan K.

testimonials.quote: Clean space, clear instruction, and no pressure. I leave feeling better every time.
testimonials.author: Alyssa R.

faqs.question: Do I need experience to join a class?
faqs.answer: No. Beginner Flow is designed for first-timers, and instructors always offer options for different levels.

faqs.question: What should I bring?
faqs.answer: Wear comfortable clothes and bring water. If you have a mat, bring it—if not, ask about rentals.

faqs.question: How early should I arrive?
faqs.answer: For your first class, arrive 10–15 minutes early so we can get you settled.

faqs.question: Is it okay if I’m not flexible?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. Flexibility is a result of practice, not a requirement to start.

faqs.question: How do I sign up?
faqs.answer: Request a free first class or contact us for the current schedule and membership options.

service_area.travel_note: We’re a local studio—if you’re nearby, you’re welcome. Parking details can be shared on request.

contact.headline: Request your first class
contact.subheadline: Tell us your experience level and best times. We’ll reply with class options and next steps.
